Title: Establishes a real property tax exemption for widowed spouses of firefighters killed in the line of duty
Summary: Establishes a real property tax exemption for the primary residences of widowed spouses of firefighters killed in the line of duty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing a real property tax exemption for widowed spouses of firefighters killed in the line of duty
